Activity: Arrive at the hospital, log in to the system, and check emails. Respond to urgent emails and prioritize tasks.
Review the EHR for any system updates or known issues related to data entry for influenza symptoms. Contact @helpdesk-1 if any issues are observed.
Begin patient assessments and EHR documentation, focusing on influenza symptoms. Pay close attention to patients presenting with co-morbidities.
Collaborate with the Medical Records Specialist @mrs-1 to ensure accuracy of patient demographic information and medical history within the EHR.
Continue patient assessments and EHR documentation, paying attention to proper coding for diagnoses and procedures.
Review the accuracy of lab results entered into the system. If necessary, contact the lab for clarification on discrepancies.

Prepare an updated summary of patient encounters, including any challenges encountered with EHR data entry or system functionality. Send summary to Clinical Lead @clinlead-1 Nadia Silva and Health Informatics Specialist @his-1.
Sign out and prepare for tomorrow.
